name: Cisco | IOS | Network | MAC | MAC Flap (SYSLOG)
description: %SW_MATM-4-MACFLAP_NOTIF: Host 0017.0e82.0850 in vlan 254 is flapping between port Gi0/24 and port Gi0/25

patterns.value_re: %(?:MAC_MOVE-SP-4-NOTIF|SW_MATM-4-MACFLAP_NOTIF|C4K_EBM-4-HOSTFLAPPING): Host (?P<mac>\S+) in vlan (?P<vlan>\d+) is flapping between port (?P<from_interface>\S+) (?:efp_id \d+ )?and port (?P<to_interface>\S+)$

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | MAC | Duplicate MAC (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-4-DUPLICATEMAC: Cable modem 0017.0e82.0850 is online on both interface Cable1/0 and interface Cable2/0.

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-4-DUPLICATEMAC: Cable modem (?P<mac>\S+) is online on both interface (?P<one_interface>\S+) and interface (?P<two_interface>\S+)$
